parameters.name: completed
parameters.description: Show only completed

parameters.name: priority
parameters.description: 0 - Low 1 - Medium 2 - High 3 - Hold

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Array of tag IDs

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search text in title and description

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Sorts in ascending order of the specified parameter. To sort in descending order, prepend a minus sign to the parameter, for example `-name`

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: dd.mm.yyyy Required with endDate

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: dd.mm.yyyy Required with startDate

parameters.name: all
parameters.description: Shows all tasks, including deleted and completed. If present, the `completed` parameter is ignored

Example.title: To deal with the font on the One Ring
Example.description: The ring interface needs to be redesigned. UX tests show that the font is small and generally illegible, moreover, not everyone gets to heat it up (the test report attached to the task). It's not urgent, but you should try not to forget about the task, it'll remind you about itself.

authorId.description: ID of the user who created the task

assignees.description: IDs of users who is executing the task

startDate.description: Start date of the task in `Y-m-d` format

startDateTime.description: Start date of the task in ISO 8601 format

dueDate.description: Due date of the task in `Y-m-d` format

dueDateTime.description: Due date of the task in ISO 8601 format

createdAt.description: Date the task was created in ISO 8601 format

updatedAt.description: Date the task was last updated in ISO 8601 format

type.description:
1 - auto calculated from timer
2 - manual added

isOvertime.description: A flag indicating that the entry was overtime

date.description: The day of entry. In `Y-m-d` format

options.description: Only for select and multiselect custom fields

url.description: Attachment URL. If `service` is `weeek`, this URL will be available for an hour.

size.description: The size of the attachment in bytes. Only present when `service` is `weeek`

customFields.description:
Key-value object with custom field id and custom field value for the task

For example

```
"customFields" : {
    "<text_custom_field_id>": "Text value",
    "<boolean_custom_field_id>": true,
    "<datetime_custom_field_id>": "<ISO 8601 datetime string>",
    "<select_custom_field_id>": "<custom_field_option_id>"
    "<multiselect_custom_field_id>": ["<custom_field_option_id>"],
    "<member_custom_field_id>": ["<user_id>"],
    "<contact_custom_field_id>": "<contact_id>",
    "<link_custom_field_id>": "Link value",
    "<approval_custom_field_id>": ["<user_id>"]
}
```

startDate.description:
The start date of the task in Y-m-d format. 
Cannot be provided with startDateTime or dueDateTime

dueDate.description: The due date of the task in Y-m-d format. Cannot be provided with startDateTime or dueDateTime

startDateTime.description: The start datetime of the task in ISO 8601 format. Cannot be provided with startDate or dueDate

dueDateTime.description: The due datetime of the task in ISO 8601 format. Cannot be provided with startDate or dueDate

customFields.description:
Key-value object with custom field id and custom field value for the task

For example

```
"customFields" : {
    "<text_custom_field_id>": "Text value",
    "<boolean_custom_field_id>": true,
    "<datetime_custom_field_id>": "<ISO 8601 datetime string>",
    "<select_custom_field_id>": "<custom_field_option_id>"
    "<multiselect_custom_field_id>": ["<custom_field_option_id>"],
    "<member_custom_field_id>": ["<user_id>"],
    "<contact_custom_field_id>": "<contact_id>",
    "<link_custom_field_id>": "Link value",
    "<approval_custom_field_id>": ["<user_id>"]
}
```

customFields.description:
Key-value object with custom field id and custom field value for the task

For example

```
"customFields" : {
    "<text_custom_field_id>": "Text value",
    "<boolean_custom_field_id>": true,
    "<datetime_custom_field_id>": "<ISO 8601 datetime string>",
    "<select_custom_field_id>": "<custom_field_option_id>"
    "<multiselect_custom_field_id>": ["<custom_field_option_id>"],
    "<member_custom_field_id>": ["<user_id>"],
    "<contact_custom_field_id>": "<contact_id>",
    "<link_custom_field_id>": "Link value",
    "<approval_custom_field_id>": ["<user_id>"]
}
```

A key-value object with custom field id as key and custom field value

For example

```
"customFields" : {
    "<text_custom_field_id>": "Text value",
    "<boolean_custom_field_id>": true,
    "<datetime_custom_field_id>": "<ISO 8601 datetime string>",
    "<select_custom_field_id>": "<custom_field_option_id>"
    "<multiselect_custom_field_id>": ["<custom_field_option_id>"],
    "<member_custom_field_id>": ["<user_id>"],
    "<contact_custom_field_id>": "<contact_id>",
    "<link_custom_field_id>": "https://example.com",
    "<approval_custom_field_id>": ["<user_id>"]
}
```

A key-value object with custom field id as key and custom field value

For example

```
"customFields" : {
    "<text_custom_field_id>": "Text value",
    "<boolean_custom_field_id>": true,
```

Custom field values.description:
A key-value object with custom field id as key and custom field value

For example

```
"customFields" : {
    "<text_custom_field_id>": "Text value",
    "<boolean_custom_field_id>": true,
    "<datetime_custom_field_id>": "<ISO 8601 datetime string>",
    "<select_custom_field_id>": "<custom_field_option_id>"
    "<multiselect_custom_field_id>": ["<custom_field_option_id>"],
    "<member_custom_field_id>": ["<user_id>"],
    "<contact_custom_field_id>": "<contact_id>",
    "<link_custom_field_id>": "https://example.com",
    "<approval_custom_field_id>": ["<user_id>"]
}
```

Workspace ID.description: Numerical identifier unique only within this resource in the workspace.

Slug ID.description: String identifier unique only within this resource in the workspace.

isOvertime.description: A flag indicating that the entry was overtime

date.description: The day of entry. In `Y-m-d` format

isOvertime.description: A flag indicating that the entry was overtime
